评论详情: First, I am so in love with this brand. I was able to order a sweatshirt through the Vine program about 6 weeks ago. I now own three other sweatshirts and this jersey-shirt. Second- can we talk about the quality of their clothing? It’s impressive. They don’t skimp on materials. They don’t skimp on skill either. This shirt was better than I expected. It’s my first shirt from Aelfric Eden. It’s exactly as pictured I could go on and on and on. It is definitely worth the price.
this shirt looks exactly as pictured. its good quality and the pink is pale but still cute. pair these with some skirt or baggy jeans for a really cute look.
